meanings: 대화 도중 I read you loud and clear.
대화 도중 I understand you perfectly.

meanings.meaning: I hear what you are saying

vlive.korean: 그렇군요 - 저희가 이제... Right. - We... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [The Rose] 더로즈 사전에 아재력은 곧 큐트력의 동의어랬습니다 🙌반.박.불.가🙌 (The Rose talking about their Europe Tour)
그렇군요 - 밥 먹자, 승민아 뭐 먹을래? Right. - Let's eat. SEUNGMIN, what do you want to eat? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SKZ에게 불어온 "바람"💨
vlive.english: Right. - Let's eat. SEUNGMIN, what do you want to eat?

vlive.korean: 아 그렇군요~ - 네! Oh, I see! - Yes! 듣기 View video JBJ95 : JBJ95 Showcase 'AWAKE'
그렇군요 그렇다면! All right, then! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MAMAMOO] 다들 가슴 한 편에 맘무콘서트용 제빙기 하나쯤은 품고 사는거 아니었나요?☀️❄️ (MAMAMOO’s concert spoiler)
그렇군, 어? 누가... I see... Oh? Someone... 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 0502호 빈린🐰🐰

examples.korean: ‘There’s another one.’ ‘So there is.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “하나가 더 있어.” “정말 그렇군.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘There’s another one.’ ‘So there is.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That is true. What did you do to handle the situation? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그건 정말 그렇군요. 그 상황을 어떻게 처리하셨나요? DARAKWON
examples.english: That is true. What did you do to handle the situation? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Oh, well. Thanks anyway. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아, 그렇군요. 어쨌든 고마워요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh, well. Thanks anyway. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I guess you're right. I'm new at this, but I'll get used to it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇군요. 이 일은 처음 해보는 거라서요, 하지만 익숙해지겠지요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I guess you're right. I'm new at this, but I'll get used to it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I see. If I use my dividends to buy more stock, do I have to pay a broker's fee? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇군요. 배당금으로 주식을 매입할 경우 수수료를 지불해야 하나요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I see. If I use my dividends to buy more stock, do I have to pay a broker's fee? Add to Wordbook
